thread.title: BRIEF-DiamondRock Hospitality Qtrly ‍adjusted FFO Per Diluted Share $0.25​

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-DiamondRock Hospitality Qtrly ‍adjusted FFO Per Diluted Share $0.25​
text:
Feb 26 (Reuters) - Diamondrock Hospitality Co:
* MPANY REPORTS FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL YEAR 2017 RESULTS * QTRLY ‍ADJUSTED FFO PER DILUTED SHARE $0.25​ * QTRLY ‍ REVPAR $184.24 VERSUS $177.45​ * ‍EXPECTS FULL YEAR 2018 COMPARABLE REVPAR GROWTH 0 PERCENT TO 2 PERCENT​
* ‍EXPECTS FULL YEAR 2018 ADJUSTED FFO PER SHARE $0.96 PER SHARE TO $1.01 PER SHARE​
* Q4 FFO PER SHARE VIEW $0.23 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* FY2018 FFO PER SHARE VIEW $0.99 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
